attributes.action: admit that it was his own serious error of judgement, through failing to consider all of the ramifications, which put Glenys Kinnock in a ministerial post which is now found to be most inappropriate to be held by a member of the House of Lords; additionally, that BECAUSE IT WAS HIS MISTAKE he will undertake personally, to fund her annual salary, expenses and tax free allowances and all future long term pension payments out of Labour Party funds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taxpayers should not be held financially responsible when Prime Ministers make blatant errors of judgement which were caused by him not paying attention to what the people want - the people do not want primary ministerial post holders to be appointed from the unnaccountable and unresponsible ranks of the membership of the House of Lords.  The people want elected (unlike himself, of course, who has NEVER been voted for by anyone now being most adversely affected by what he is doing)members of the House of Commons to hold primary ministerial posts.
